author: rubys
msg: Fix typo

author: rubys
msg: Rewrite vote-filter.py to be a full-fledged front end to stv_tool.py.
Modify whatif.rb to be a web based interface to whatif.py, and to use
HTTP POST for AJAX requests (in order to avoid cluttering the access logs).

author: gstein
msg: Update instructions for vote counters, and toss the now-obsolete format conversion scripts.

author: gstein
msg: make the README more obvious

author: gstein
msg: Enable reading of the raw_board_votes.txt files (rather than needing a
pass through nstv-rank.py).
This also provides a bit of USAGE output, and gets the file name from
the cmdline.
* foundation/voter/stv_tool.py:
(RE_VOTE): new regex to find the voter lines. pulled from nstv-rank,
with group names added for clarity
(load_votes): load old-style nstv-rank output files, or the raw vote
file input.
(read_nominess): new helper to read the nominess from the vote
file's sibling 'board_nominations.ini' file.
(generate_random): augment a comment
(usage): new helper to print the USAGE
(__main__): run a couple checks on the cmdline args. use the
specified file rather than a hard-coded temp.
